content.question: Object <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="m sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and Object <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> of mass <math alttext="m sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> move along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis toward each other with speeds <math alttext="v sub 1 i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub 2 i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></math>, respectively. The objects collide and then move away from each other with speeds <math alttext="v sub 1 f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></math> and <math alttext="v sub 2 f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></math>, respectively, as shown in the figure. There are no external forces acting on the two-object system. What is the magnitude of the impulse exerted on Object <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> by Object <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> during the collision?

choices.label: <math alttext="m sub 1 times, the absolute value of, v sub 1 f minus v sub 1 i, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mpadded><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mpadded></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="m sub 1 times, open parenthesis, v sub 1 f plus v sub 1 i, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="m sub 1 times, the absolute value of, v sub 2 f minus v sub 2 i, end absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="m sub 1 times, open parenthesis, v sub 2 f plus v sub 2 i, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m sub 1 times, open parenthesis, v sub 1 f plus v sub 1 i, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
